biotools.summary: The portal integrates information on news, events, clinical trials, thalassaemia-related organisations, research projects, and other scientific networks. Most importantly, disease-specific databases are developed and maintained on the portal, such as databases of haemoglobin variations (IthaGenes, IthaCNV), epidemiology (IthaMaps) and genotype-phenotype annotation (IthaPhen).

bioschemas.name: ITHANET
bioschemas.summary: The portal integrates information on news, events, clinical trials, thalassaemia-related organisations, research projects, and other scientific networks. Most importantly, disease-specific databases are developed and maintained on the portal, such as databases of haemoglobin variations (IthaGenes, IthaCNV), epidemiology (IthaMaps) and genotype-phenotype annotation (IthaPhen).
